home.intro:
Hi, I'm Fran. I'm a software engineer who likes building stuff. I'm into cooking, music production and video games.
 I also like writing.

splashTexts: Tech is cool until you use Jira.

about.splashText: Any opinions expressed on this blog are solely mine.

resume.splashText:
Hi, I'm Fran üëã. I'm a software engineer interested in both front and back end development.
I'm passionate about building scalable and maintainable software.

experience.title: Capital One, iOS Engineer I
experience.subtitle: November 2022 - Present
experience.sections:
Working on the Capital One UK iOS app. Swift UI & UI Kit.
Refined and led technical exploration on features related to the in-app FAQ.
Experience writing unit, UI and visual regression tests.

experience.title: Capital One, Web Engineer I
experience.subtitle: September 2021 - November 2022
experience.sections:
Working on internal web app tool, powered with Typescript, React, Express, GraphQL and Node.js.
Championed functional testing with Cypress within the team.
Became point of information involving integration with Finesse. Championed a Finesse integration Node.js package to be reused within the company.
Experience with working with AWS and services like their Lambda serverless computing.
Experience in setting up Docker containers for our testing in our pipeline.

experience.title: Capital One, Backend Engineer I
experience.subtitle: June 2020 - September 2020
experience.sections:
Internship experience.
Designed Java-based REST API service that called an external service.
Service developed from start to end, using AWS Lambda and Jersey.
Experience with Cucumber testing.

education.title: University of Nottingham, MSc Computer Science with AI (1st)
education.subtitle: September 2017 - June 2021
education.sections:
Focus on Machine Learning and Big Data.
Experience with web technologies and software quality theory.
 Thesis based on multi-agent simulation for epidemiology.
